name: Dances with Butterflies VR
description: Conduct clouds of Monarch butterflies in the forests of Mexico.
minimum_requirements: OS: 8.1 Processor: Intel® i5-4590, AMD FX 8350 equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (AMD Radeon R9 290) or better, AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or better, Video Output: HDMI 1.4, DisplayPort 1.2 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 250 MB available space Sound Card: N/A
